page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN UPWEY (2)
page.content: A.E.MILLS BUILDERS ALSO HAD 2 WORKERS WHO LIVED IN WEYMOUTH,AND THE WISHING WELL SHOP HAD 6 WORKERS WHO LIVED IN WEYMOUTH. ALL THE 8 PLACES OF EMPLOYMENT WERE CONTACTED,BUT INFORMATION WAS UNOBTAINABLE AT SOME. FROM THIS SURVEY WE CAN SEE THAT THERE ARE VERY FEW PLACES OF EMPLOYMENT.THOSE THAT THERE ARE EMPLOY ONLY A SMALL NUMBER OF PEOPLE.THIS PERHAPS SHOWS THAT UPWEY IS REALLY A SUBURB (ALTHOUGH RURAL) OF WEYMOUTH. THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE LIVING IN UPWEY WORK IN AREAS OUTSIDE THE ACTUAL VILLAGE.THIS IS UNDERSTANDABLE CONSIDERING THE NUMBER OF PLACES OF WORK.
